translations: 树神；印度产的一种毒蛇

sentences.sentence: Science (or rather half-way science) scoffs at reminiscence of dryad and hamadryad.
sentences.translation: 科学（或者伪科学）嘲笑人们回忆森林女神和树神。

sentences.sentence: Science (or rather half-way science) scoffs at reminiscence of dryad and hamadryad, and of trees speaking.
sentences.translation: 科学（或者伪科学）嘲笑人们回忆森林女神和树神，嘲笑树间的轻语。
